TopicTitle: Why is the rifter from EVE online so famous.

Articles.Content: Personaly ive never played the game,montly tax subscription i just a bit wrong for me.

I tried a 14-day trial and joined a corporation. I had fun but at the end of the trial I realized that I don't want to pay for a second job.

I'd probably still be playing if it was free.
If I was going to play an MMO that charged a subscription, EVE would be the one I'd play. You can pay for the subscription with ingame currency afaik.

1. Its a great ship. It's very versitile and it's new player friendly

2. EVE ships have some weird designs but the Rifter very much looks like a combat spaceship.

It's gone through several updates and rebalances over the years, but basically it's a small ship that new players can get into and fit easily, and yet still be worth something in a fight. Also because winmatar.
